def can_form_permutations(n, a, b):
    """
    Determines if there exist two permutations p and q of length n,
    such that the length of the longest common prefix of p and q is a,
    and the length of the longest common suffix of p and q is b.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The length of the permutations.
    a (int): The length of the longest common prefix.
    b (int): The length of the longest common suffix.

    Returns:
    bool: True if such permutations exist, False otherwise.
    """
    return a == b == n and a + b < n - 1

mutants.original_line: return a == b == n or a + b < n - 1
mutants.mutated_line: return a != b == n or a + b < n - 1
